      static void stopSDK(Context context)
      已过时。  
      static void unregisterPlatform(java.lang.Class<? extends CustomPlatform> platform)
      unregister the custom platform you don't have to call this method to unregister the platform, after you calling stopSDK(), all platforms will be unregistered
      this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()
      static void unregisterService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
      unregister ShareSDK service you don't have to call this method to unregister the service, after you calling stopSDK(), all service will be unregistered
      this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initSDK

        public static void initSDK(Context context)
        call this method to init ShareSDK, this method must be called in main thread

      • initSDK

        public static void initSDK(Context context,
           boolean enableStatistics)

      • initSDK

        public static void initSDK(Context context,
           java.lang.String SDKAppKey)
        expansion options of initSDK(Context), call this method to setting ShreSDK Appkey at runtime

      • initSDK

        public static void initSDK(Context context,
           java.lang.String SDKAppKey,
           boolean enableStatistics)
        expansion options of initSDK(Context), call this method to switching using statistics or not
        参数:
        enableStatistics - determin wether to send shared content to ShareSDK server or not, default is true, means turn on

      • stopSDK

        public static void stopSDK(Context context)
        已过时。 
        call this method before you app close

        Deprecated method, use stopSDK() instead

      • stopSDK

        public static void stopSDK()
        call this method before you app close

      • registerService

        public static void registerService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
        register ShareSDK service.

        call unregisterService(Class) to unregister the service.
        every service only registers one time before it's unregister
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • unregisterService

        public static void unregisterService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
        unregister ShareSDK service

        you don't have to call this method to unregister the service, after you calling stopSDK(), all service will be unregistered
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • getService

        public static <T extends Service> T getService(java.lang.Class<T> name)
        get a registered service instance by its name

      • registerPlatform

        public static void registerPlatform(java.lang.Class<? extends CustomPlatform> platform)
        register the custom platform.

        call unregisterPlatform(Class) to unregister the platform.
        every platform only registers one time before it's unregister
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • unregisterPlatform

        public static void unregisterPlatform(java.lang.Class<? extends CustomPlatform> platform)
        unregister the custom platform

        you don't have to call this method to unregister the platform, after you calling stopSDK(), all platforms will be unregistered
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • getSDKVersionName

        public static java.lang.String getSDKVersionName()
        returns the version of ShareSDK in String type, like: a.b.c

      • getSDKVersionCode

        public static int getSDKVersionCode()
        returns the version of ShareSDK in integer type

      • setConnTimeout

        public static void setConnTimeout(int timeout)
        set network connection timeout

      • setReadTimeout

        public static void setReadTimeout(int timeout)
        set network reading timeout

      • removeCookieOnAuthorize

        public static void removeCookieOnAuthorize(boolean remove)
        determine whether remove cookie before web authorizing or not.

        default value is false: don't remove

      • getPlatformList

        @Deprecated
public static Platform[] getPlatformList(Context context)
        已过时。 
        get registered platform list of ShareSDK

        Deprecated method, use getPlatformList() instead

        get registered platform list of ShareSDK

               int platformId)

      • setPlatformDevInfo

        public static void setPlatformDevInfo(java.lang.String platform,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> devInfo)
        set dev info at runtime for the right platform
        参数:
        platform - the platform
        devInfo - fields and values according to assets/ShareSDK.xml

      • platformIdToName
